title: Microsoft Office Home 2024 | Classic Apps: Word, Excel, PowerPoint | One-Time Purchase for 1 PC/MAC | Instant Download | Formerly Home & Student 2021 [PC/Mac Online Code]
description: For an individual who want classic Office apps installed on one PC or Mac for use at home or school. Office 2024 includes traditional desktop versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, and Outlook.*Outlook only available in Office Home & Business 2024.
